rsbNotes.title: Pr 27:1
rsbNotes.text: 27:1 Though wisdom is concerned with taking hold on life, people do not have complete control over their future. Fools think they have, but they do not reckon with the sovereign will of God (21:30 note; Luke 12:19, 20).

rsbNotes.title: Pr 27:2
rsbNotes.text: 27:2 Wisdom is humble (cf. 1 Cor. 13:4, 5).
